original_text: Mine eyes do fail with tears, my bowels are troubled, my liver is poured upon the earth, for the destruction of the daughter of my people; because the children and the sucklings swoon in the streets of the city.
korean_text: 내 눈이 눈물에 상하며 내 창자가 끊어지며 내 간이 땅에 쏟아졌으니 이는 딸 내 백성이 패망하여 어린 자녀와 젖 먹는 아이들이 성읍 길거리에 기절함이로다

sentences.original_text: Mine eyes do fail with tears
my liver is poured upon the earth
for the destruction of the daughter of my people
because the children and the sucklings swoon
in the streets of the city
the children and the sucklings swoon in the streets of the city
